Pak Ui Chun Meets Malaysian Ambassador to DPRK
   Pyongyang, September 23 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun met and had a talk with Rahimi Bin Harun, new Malaysian ambassador to the DPRK, on Tuesday when the latter paid a courtesy call on him.
